Action.author: davidkel
Action.body: That's correct. The idea is to be able to export an enrolled or imported user into a portable format so that it can be imported onto another system for example.

Action.author: harrisob@us.ibm.com
Action.body: Is this still required ? This will not work in all cases... like with an HSM. If the applications is using a database as the stores then there would be no need to move.

Action.author: davidkel
Action.body: Closing as Composer implemented a solution accessing internal properties (not ideal but it works) so not required.
